content.raw:
there was a bug in the original RGBD camera depth readings and it’s fixed in this [ign-rendering pull request](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/187/support-generating-point-cloud-data-in/diff), see screenshots there. The data returned were range values instead of depth.

There may also be slight differences in RGB image data. Some changes were made in the way RGB data get transferred from gpu to cpu for performance reasons. I’m hoping the differences are small.
content.html:
there was a bug in the original RGBD camera depth readings and it’s fixed in this ign-rendering pull request, see screenshots there. The data returned were range values instead of depth.

There may also be slight differences in RGB image data. Some changes were made in the way RGB data get transferred from gpu to cpu for performance reasons. I’m hoping the differences are small.
